import React, { Component } from 'react' import { ListGroup, ListGroupItem } from 'reactstrap'; export default class listMethods extends Component { state = { customers: this.props.customers, isActive: false, listMethods: ["List by id", "List by name", "List by country", "List by salary"], currentMethod: "0", isUpdate: true, selectedUser: [] } render() { const { setCurrentListMethod, sortCustomers } = this.props const { listMethods } = this.state return (

List Methods

{listMethods.map((e, index) => ( { setCurrentListMethod(index); sortCustomers(index + 1) }} active={this.state.currentMethod === index ? true : false} >{e} ))}
